message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a special introductory price of $150.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $150 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $85.  Let me know if that works for you.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents a fair price for its value, I could come down to $130 for you.  I believe this product will exceed your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.  Let's see if we can make this work.
